item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, October 28, 2024 at 6:20 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Buy payphones and retire (148 points | 32 comments)
2. Using reinforcement learning and $4.80 of GPU time to find the best HN post (29 points | 16 comments)
3. The sins of the 90s: Questioning a puzzling claim about mass surveillance (84 points | 22 comments)
4. New iMac with M4 (253 points | 499 comments)
5. Scott Fitzgerald's Last Act (19 points | 14 comments)
6. How Gothic architecture became spooky (133 points | 69 comments)
7. NY Times Gets 230 Wrong Again; Misrepresenting History and the First Amendment (30 points | 5 comments)
8. Critique of Freakonomics interview with psychologist Ellen Langer (45 points | 25 comments)
9. GenAI's dirty secret: It's set to create a mountainous increase in e-waste (13 points | discuss)
10. Using Rust in non-Rust servers to improve performance (255 points | 140 comments)
11. State-space models can learn in-context by gradient descent (28 points | 6 comments)
12. High-resolution postmortem human brain MRI at 7 tesla (14 points | 1 comment)
13. Ask HN: What Are You Working On? (October 2024) (330 points | 889 comments)
14. Can a Rubik's Cube be brute-forced? (6 points | 4 comments)
15. Debugging Audio Artifacts Caused by a Serial Port? (21 points | 5 comments)
16. Apple Intelligence is coming to the EU in April 2025 (4 points | discuss)
17. Ask HN: What's your favorite text-based adventure game? (25 points | 19 comments)
18. It is fine not to like a piece of Free software (7 points | 4 comments)
19. Mill: A fast JVM build tool for Java and Scala (120 points | 94 comments)
20. Psychological Safety vs. High Standards: A Misunderstood Dynamic (49 points | 26 comments)
21. How not to sort by average rating (2009) (6 points | 2 comments)
22. 70% of meteorites from 3 collisions in asteroid belt within past 40M years (7 points | discuss)
23. Debian's "secret" sauce (22 points | 1 comment)
24. Python PGP proposal poses packaging puzzles (25 points | 1 comment)
25. 418 I’m a teapot (193 points | 117 comments)
26. Visualizing the Nucleus [video] (5 points | 1 comment)
27. Oriental hornets can't get drunk (4 points | 2 comments)
28. Hoard of coins from Norman Conquest is Britain's most valuable treasure find (151 points | 74 comments)
29. GoLic, injects license into source code files (19 points | 13 comments)
30. Apple iPhone 16 sales blocked in Indonesia due to local parts rule (5 points | 1 comment)
